dict.string: Optional: used only for “Focus Me” and nearby browsing. Location is processed on-device; Footprint Atlas does not upload or sell your location.

Footprint Atlas builds your private photo map by reading photo date + embedded GPS. Processing is on-device only — no account, no cloud upload, no selling or sharing of your photos/data. Recommended: grant Full Access so we can index all your photos with locations (Limited Access may miss pins).
